document_data.name: Accalia
document_data.mainbody: '''Accalia''' was a female [[human]] priest from the [[Temple of Tempus (Easthaven)|Temple of Tempus]] in [[Easthaven]] within the [[Ten Towns]] of [[Icewind Dale]].
document_data.Description: As a follower of [[Tempus]], the priestess wore armor even while completing her temple duties.
document_data.History:
Accalia traveled from [[Neverwinter]] after [[Everard|Everard's]] fellow [[priest]], [[Renfeld]], was killed outside [[Bryn Shander]] during a [[Reghedmen]] [[barbarian]] raid. 

In [[Eleint]], [[1281 DR]], Accalia aided Everard in his duties for maintaining the temple.
